lexUnit.name: bulletin.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a short official statement or summary of news.

sentence.text: Sales of prime London properties are picking up and the latest quarterly bulletin from the London Research Centre shows that for the first time in over a year , average prices have not fallen .
